div.p: Bogata oferta kierunków studiów, dzięki którym odniesiesz sukces w biznesie. Postaw na nowoczesne programy nauczania i wykładowców z pasją.
Wspólnie tworzymy społeczność akademicką i mamy świadomość spoczywającej na nas odpowiedzialności za wpływ, jaki wywieramy na nasze otoczenie.

li.a: International Conference on Quality and Management Sciences

div.h1: International Conference on Quality and Management Sciences

p.strong: to the 2nd International Conference on Quality and Management Sciences 2023

div.p: it is our honor and great pleasure to invite you to the 2nd International Conference on Quality and Management Sciences 2023 (2nd ICQMSc 2023) to be held from 13 to 15 September 2023 in Poznań, Poland. This will be the second meeting organized by Institute of Quality Science at Poznań University of Economics and Business, which is an event based on the International Commodity Science Conference (IComSC) with many years of tradition. The first edition was successfully initiated during the pandemic with an online meeting, however this time with great pleasure we would like to invite you onsite to the historic main building of the University, in the center of Poznań.

The scientific program of the conference will focus on current advances in all areas of quality, commodity and management sciences with particular emphasis on their role in sustainable development. Special attention will be paid to the innovations, quality of processes, food and non-food products, and packaging from a multidisciplinary perspective, including management, technological, consumer and environmental issues. We believe that the conference will be an excellent opportunity to present research results and will provide forum for exchanging knowledge and scientific ideas at the interface of social and natural sciences. We hope for a broad participation of experienced researchers, Ph.D. and graduate students and practitioners interested in all aspects of quality, commodity and management.
We cordially invite you to participate in the conference.

Prof. Ewa Sikorska, Director of the Institute of Quality Science, PUEB
Prof. Daniela Gwiazdowska, Head of the Organizing Committee, PUEB
Conference date: Wednesday 13 to Friday 15 September 2023

July 15, 2023 registration
July 15, 2023 abstracts submission
June 30, 2023 fee payment
July 31, 2023 articles submission

tr.td:
Attendance only or accompanying person
(no presentation and publication)

div.p: All prices include VAT.

ul.li: certificate of participation,coffee breaks, lunches, dinners (including Gala dinner),

div.p: *published article in the post-conference monograph (in PDF).
*for those who selected the fee including the article submission.

Each registered participant may submit maximum two abstracts, and therefore may present two posters or one oral presentation and one poster. Each participant may publish only one scientific article as part of the fee “with the article”. The additional fee for publishing a full paper in a conference monograph is 95 EUR (450 PLN). This fee should be paid per paper, regardless of the number of authors, by the corresponding author along with the conference fee. Papers submitted for the monograph will be subject to a peer review process.
The conference fee should be paid by bank transfer to:

Account to pay in PLN
Payee Account Name: Uniwersytet Ekonomiczny w Poznaniu
Payee Address: al. Niepodległości 10, 61-875 Poznań
Account No: 54 1090 1359 0000 0000 3501 8918
Santander Bank Polska SA
Transfer title: ICQMSc 2023, name and surname, and affiliation of the participant

Account for payment in EUR
Payee Account Name: Poznań University of Economics and Business
Payee Address: al. Niepodległości 10, 61-875 Poznań
Account No: PL 02 1090 1359 0000 0001 0062 7162
SWIFT CODE: WBKPPLPP
Transfer title: ICQMSc 2023, name and surname, and affiliation of the participant
Registration for the 2nd ICQMSc 2023

Abstracts must be submitted as an e-mail attachment in MS Word format to ICQMSC@ue.poznan.pl no later than 15 July 2023. The title of the document should include the corresponding author’s surname (Surname_abstract_2023). One presenting author may submit a maximum of two abstracts and therefore may present two posters or one oral presentation and one poster. When preparing your abstract, please use provided abstract template and follow the guidelines.

Papers must be submitted as an e-mail attachment in MS Word format to ICQMSC@ue.poznan.pl no later than 31 July 2023. The title of the document should include the corresponding author’s name (Surname_manuscript_2023). When preparing your paper, please follow the provided guidelines.
The conference will be held at the Poznań University of Economics and Business,
Poznań, al. Niepodległości 10, Poland.

Looking for a hotel?
The ICQMSc Organizing Committee has prepared a list of conference accommodations near our event location with a special discount, for the Conference Participants!

Participants are responsible for making their own accommodation arrangements. Please note that September is the International Trade Fair period in Poznań, so we recommend booking in advance to secure your accommodation with the best available rates.
The accommodation offers during the 2nd International Conference on Quality and Management Sciences 2023:

The scientific program will be devoted to the recent advances in quality, commodity and management sciences and the role of these disciplines in sustainable development. Particularly, the focus will be on the innovations, quality of processes, products and packaging from a multidisciplinary perspective, including management, technological, consumer, and environmental aspects.

p.strong: Main topics include, but are not limited to:

div.p:
Design, quality and safety of food and non-food products
Innovative products, materials and technologies
Product and Process Management
Human-centered design
Consumer behavior and preferences
Sustainable production and consumption
Quality in Industry 4.0 era
Circular economy and waste management
Eco-design and eco-innovations
The scientific program will consist of plenary lectures, keynote lectures, oral presentations and poster presentations.

div.h3: Antonella Pasqualone, University of Bari, Italy

li.span: Title: From food waste to functional foods: application to the cereal supply chain

div.h3: Harshadrai Rawel, University of Potsdam, Germany

li.span: Title: Characterization and valorization of agricultural and food industrial wastes - the case of coffee production
Title: Determination of the quality of food products during technological process and storage by the application of targeted and untargeted techniques: advantages and drawbacks

div.h3: Bazyli Czyżewski & Łukasz Kryszak, Poznan University of Economics and Business, Poland

li.span: Title: Agricultural greenhouse gases and food security inefficiencies in countries with different land productivities: Policy orientation and global targets

li.span: Title: Food safety culture and just culture in food safety management

div.h3: Eva Waginger, Vienna University of Economics and Business, Austria

li.span: Title: The twilight of Commodity Science. Don't contemporary economists need to know about commodities?
